newsitem.title: RUSSIA: City of Moscow says to set Eurobond price Tuesday.
newsitem.headline: City of Moscow says to set Eurobond price Tuesday.

text.p: The City of Moscow will set the price and spread of its debut Eurobond on Tuesday, a senior official at the Mayor's office said.
"The launch of the Eurobond will start today," First Deputy Chairman of Municipal Borrowing Committee Sergei Pakhomov told Reuters. "The price and the spread must be set today."
The City of Moscow plans to launch a three-year Eurobond of between $300 and $400 million.
Pakhomov said he expected to sell the whole issue within less than seven days.
